description.narrative: Operational support for delivery of programme results including zonal offices, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

title.narrative: Niger United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Niger Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Communication for Development)
UNICEF Policy on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Niger 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Operational support for delivery of programme results including zonal offices

description.narrative: Salary and operational costs of UNICEF offices in Niamey, Maradi, Agadez and Diffa greatly contributed to achievement of programmatic results in 2019. Cross-sectoral staff throughout the year contributed to logistics, procurement, transportation, administration, human resources and finance, thus enabling the delivery of the country programme. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/02/2020
